bathroom.description: You stand in a dirty bathroom, mold grows in the corners.
bathroom.entry: You enter the bathroom and immediately feel repulsed. It is dirty and moldy.

mold.examine: Why do you want to examine mold? That's disgusting.
mold.name: window

sink.description: A working porcelain sink stands in the corner.
sink.examine: I see nothing special about the sink. It's made of porcelain.
sink.name: sink

soap.brokenText: You break the bar of soap and a bird-shaped ring falls out.
soap.description: A bar of soap lies on the sink.
soap.examine: An ordinary bar of soap, you can see a glint of metal. You would need to break the bar of soap.
soap.name: soap

toilet.description: Opposite to the sink is a dry and dirty toilet. The lid is up.
toilet.examine: I see nothing special about the toilet, it is dirty and dry.
toilet.name: toilet

bathroom.name: bathroom
bathroom.outside: You can see the bathroom in your tiny cell from here.

cell.description: You stand in a plain white cell with simple furnishing.
cell.entry: You come back home to your cell, and take a rest in the chair.

chair.description: A simple oak chair lies in the corner collecting dust
chair.examine: I see nothing special about the chair
chair.name: chair

desk.description: An old desk stands across the room, one leg is shorter than the other three
desk.examine: I see nothing special about the desk
desk.name: desk

diary.description: A leather cover back diary sits neatly on the desk.
diary.examine: You flip open the diary to see that it's blank. You could probably write in it if you had a pen.
diary.name: diary

lock.description: A simple lock resides on the door of the cell.
lock.examine: Seems like a regular lock. You could pick it if you had the right materials.
lock.name: lock

window.description: Thin rays of light shine through the thick glass of the small barred window
window.examine: I see nothing special about the window
window.name: window

cell.name: cell
cell.outside: You can see the door leading back into the cell where you live.

church.description: You stand in a small white church, light shines through a central window behind the lectern.
church.entry: You enter the church, it is warmer in here.

lectern.examine: I see nothing special about the lectern
lectern.name: desk

window.examine: I see nothing special about the window
window.name: window

church.name: church
church.outside: A church looms in the distance.

house.description: You stand in the old house, you can hear the sound of the wind blowing through gaps in the roof.
house.entry: You step in the old house, a floorboard creaks under your weight.

garlic.description: A knob of garlic, seems fresh enough to consume
garlic.examine: I see nothing special about the garlic
garlic.name: garlic

key.examine: I see nothing special about the key.
key.name: key

snail.eat: That is really revolting. I will not allow it.
snail.examine: I see nothing special about the snail, I can't fathom why I have it. It is slimy
snail.name: snail

house.name: house
house.outside: A creaky old house with no door stands to the side. There are spiderwebs on the windowsill.

office.description: You stand in a dimly lit office.
office.entry: You enter the guard's office, which is to the left of your cell. It's just a receptionist's office, repurposed for - sleeping, apparently.

guard.description: A guard who is supposed to be on duty is asleep.
guard.examine: His breath stinks and his hair is greasy.
guard.name: guard

pen.description: A pen sit quietly on a table.
pen.examine: Seems like a regular pen, it is running out of ink
pen.name: pen

usedText.cell: You pull out your pen to write in your diary.

table.examine: I see nothing special about the table
table.name: table

wallet.description: A wallet is in the guard's pocket, it is close to falling out.
wallet.examine: A picture of the guard and his dog reside inside the wallet.
wallet.name: wallet

office.name: office
office.outside: From here you can see the entrance to the guard's office.

store.description: You stand in the general store.
store.entry:
You entered the local general store, a bell rings to announce your entrance and the shopkeeper looks up. 
'What would you like to buy?' asks the shopkeeper.

hammer.description: A hammer with an oak handle
hammer.examine: I see nothing special about the hammer
hammer.name: hammer

hat.description: A hat to keep out the sun
hat.examine: I see nothing special about the hat
hat.name: hat

tea.examine: I see nothing special about the tea
tea.name: tea

store.name: store
store.outside: From here, the dirt trail outside leads back to the store.

town.description: You stand in the town center, an old bronze statue stares back at you
town.entry: You walk into the town center, and nearly hit the bronze statue of EastRiver's founder.

statue.examine: You squint real hard at the statue of the town's founder. It squints right back
statue.name: statue

town.name: town
town.outside: The town center is close by outside.
